attributes.action: Cut Down Energy Bills & Fuel Cost
attributes.additional_details:
Soaring Energy Bills & High Fuel Costs Will be Making People More Poorer. The Government Should Intervene Now to Do Something About It. It's Becoming More & More Difficult For People to Afford as Income Levels are Falling & Inflation is Going Up...

Please Do Something Before it's too late as Energy Companies Should Be Forced To Reduce Their Prices Inline With Whole Sale Costs.

Fuel Price Could be Decreased By Reducing Taxes as currently Taxes Make Up 60% Of the Cost...

Please Do Something....
